Welcome to **Data Dispatches**, the online portal for [JHU Data Services](https://dataservices.library.jhu.edu/) data tutorials. Here you will find short tutorials, primarily in R and Python, on a number of data related topics including access, cleaning, analysis, and visualization.

Topics are organized into themes, with individual topics called **dispatches**.

### What's a Dispatch?

Dispatches are short tutorials on a number of data subjects. Use the navigation on the left to find tutorials of interest, or use the search function in the top of the sidebar.
